title: Existence of Heteroclinic Solutions in Nonlinear Differential Equations of the Second-Order Incorporating Generalized Impulse Effects with the Possibility of Application to Bird Population Growth
content: This work considers the existence of heteroclinic solutions for second order differential equations with ϕ-Laplacians and generalized impulsive conditions on the real line. For the construction of the results, it was only imposed that ϕ is a homeomorphism and the Schauder’s fixed point theorem allied with the concepts of L1-Carathéodory functions and sequences together with the equiconvergence on infinity and on each impulsive moments. Finally, a practical part illustrates the main theorem.
